name: places/ChIJdxDjazqXwokR6rsDyqri58c
formattedAddress: 345 E 76th St suite 1C, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 345 E 76th St suite 1C, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text:
We used Golden I for a complete gut renovation of our 2 bed, 2 bath coop on the Upper East Side. From day 1, Tony and the team were responsive and professional. Working in a coop can often times be a huge headache but with Tony at your disposal, you know someone has your best interests at heart and will make sure there are no speed bumps. We’ve worked with several contractors over the years and none produce the same caliber end product as Tony. Making sure you get exactly what you want while providing great recommendations Is a recipe for success, and this is how Tony runs his business. We were absolutely astonished at the quality of work, and unbelievable attention to detail. Golden I is truly one of those businesses that will leave you completely happy, and recommending them to everyone you know. Thank you for building our dream
Apartment!

originalText.text: Hired Tony and his team to design and install built-in cabinetry. They did an amazing job and made our apartment look like our dream home! Professional and friendly staff kept us well informed on the progress throughout the project. Would highly recommend Golden I for future projects.

text.text: Hired Tony and his team to design and install built-in cabinetry. They did an amazing job and made our apartment look like our dream home! Professional and friendly staff kept us well informed on the progress throughout the project. Would highly recommend Golden I for future projects.

originalText.text: We used Golden I for a gut renovation of a prewar apartment on the Upper East Side that was featured in the New York Times Real Estate section. We had known Tony from a smaller job many years ago.  This was a major project involving extensive planning, approvals and construction lasting many months.  Throughout the project, the Golden I team remained extremely dedicated to the project. There were some expected bumps in the road, but in the end the apartment looks incredible.  Tony and his team (including Tano who did the most actual work on the apartment) went above and beyond our expectations.  They are still responsive and available to help with little things here and there.  Most of all, they are honest, resourceful and were enthusiastic throughout the project.  We highly recommend him and his team, and are very happy with our choice of contractor.

originalText.text: Golden I just completed a renovation of our kitchen and painted the rest of our apartment, and I could not be more pleased with the process and the results!  The work was conducted efficiently and conscientiously and is of the highest quality.  Tony was terrific--very hands on.  His recommendations were spot on; he knows his stuff.  From our end, not Golden I's, there were unforeseen delays to begin the project, but Tony stuck with it, even though it complicated his schedule, and he deserves even higher praise for his honorable conduct. I recommend Golden I without reservation.

From our end, not Golden I's, there were unforeseen delays to begin the project, but Tony stuck with it, even though it complicated his schedule, and he deserves even higher praise for his honorable conduct. I recommend Golden I without reservation.

originalText.text: We retained Golden I Construction to renovate our NYC apartment.  Tony and his team helped us develop our plans and, after permits were received, worked diligently within our agreed budget and timeline.  The standard of their work and the quality of the cabinetry installed were both very high.  Any questions arising as the project progressed were quickly and satisfactorily answered.  Like us, our co-op building management was impressed by their work.  We would definitely recommend Golden I Construction for an apartment renovation.
